sets then we had to find a way to import

behind the scenes if we missed one

then we also had to verify that that IM

raised reusable delegation sets i'll

bump the resource record set limit like

records within them
so we're now done our limit for
delegation sets is 2,00 that means we
can migrate zones in chunks of 2,000
domains so imagine having to work with
your registar and telling them we want
to cut over this many domains right the
bigger that list is the easier it is for
us and our goal was to finish this

domains so the bigger that limit was the
more chunks the more domains we could

53 to ensure for that 100% accuracy so

in Route 53 when you create a zone
